ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: ... may ask ... educated ... list, and ... I have never used anything like this before so please be patience with my ignorance.  I an Tudan the barbarian
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:39 PM 5/8/99 +0000, you wrote:
>Greetings!
>
>Welcome to the EQ BlackSmiths Discussion group. Here new and old smiths
may ask
>questions and offer advice to those of us whom are slightly less than
educated
>in the art. Please remember to be courteous to the other folk on the
list, and
>enjoy! :)
>
>Chade
>chade@...
>
I have never used anything like this before so please be patience with my
ignorance. I an Tudan the barbarian Shaman, I have pruchased sheet and a
mold placed in the the furnace and I got nothing in return. Did I do
something wrong, or an i not skilled enough
Please let me know
Thanks in advance
Tudan
